# nginx-gen

Generate nginx configs from plain English. Use when you need reverse proxy, SSL, or load balancing setup.

## Quick Facts
- id: `nginx-gen--cf47b8ac2b`

- tags: `github, git, node, docker, security, ci`

## Use When
- Setting up a new web server
- Don't remember the proxy_pass syntax
- Need to add SSL to an existing site
- Configuring nginx for a Docker container
